attributes.action: Stop deporting asylum seekers to Rwanda
attributes.background: The recent announcement of Priti Patel's plan to send asylum seekers that arrive in the UK to Rwanda is abhorrent and inhumane. We should not be sending extremely vulnerable people, at great cost to the taxpayer, to a country that the UK raised human rights concerns about just last year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
